text: The Aursund Bridge () is a cantilever bridge that crosses the Aursundet strait in Aure Municipality in Møre og Romsdal county, Norway. The bridge goes between just north of the village of Aure on the mainland and the island of Ruøya. Along with the Mjosund Bridge, it is part of the road connection between the mainland and the island of Ertvågsøya. The long Aursund Bridge opened in 1995 and it is built of prestressed concrete.. title: Aursund Bridge
